it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.AbstractNamed
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.Control
        • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyTarget, Named

    public final class Control
extends Control
implements PropertyTarget
    Objects created from this class are bigraphical controls describing the modality (i.e. active or passive) and the arity (i.e. the number of ports) of nodes decorated with it. Every Bigraph has a Signature describing the controls that can be assigned to its nodes; every Node should be assigned exactly one control.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Control

        public Control(boolean active,
       int arity)
        Creates a control for the given arity and modality and assign it a fresh name.
        Parameters:
        active - a boolean indicating whether the control is active or passive.
        arity - a non-negative integer defining the number of ports of the nodes decorated with this control.

      • Control

        public Control(java.lang.String name,
       boolean active,
       int arity)
        Creates a control for the given name, arity and modality.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the control.
        active - a boolean indicating whether the control is active or passive.
        arity - a non-negative integer defining the number of ports of the nodes decorated with this control.
